column1: And I’m proud to be one of the people that endorsed ⁦@RepThomasMassie⁩! https://t.co/3DsiQEkHHB
Thomas Massie has made a difference in Washington and will continue to do so with your support. He has my strongest endorsement and full support for his re-election.

He has also stood up for President Trump often against all the Democrat Witch Hunts. Thomas Massie is not a career politician. He's a taxpayer a businessman and a family man who's concerned that the debt threatens our future.
No one stands stronger for the ideals of liberty no one supports the constitution and no one fights harder against big government. Without question Thomas Massie has supported these ideals every day.

.@RepThomasMassie fights for his district for Kentucky and for our country every day. No one stands stronger for the ideals of liberty or supports the constitution while fighting for their district Kentucky and America like Massie.

This #GivingTuesday please support RANDPAC's mission to lead the battle for sound money limited government and fidelity to our Constitution. Give here: https://t.co/durOlBz28n With your support we fight for Pro-Liberty Pro-Constitution policy and candidates across the country. https://t.co/H9UKqnTnHy

Just finished @ConLawWarrior’s ‘Terms of Engagement.’ A great read for anyone who believes that the judiciary should presume liberty and not allow the scales of justice to give favoritism to government. https://t.co/BfhcVmJAqp
Experience is the best teacher -- But that's not how I want my kids to learn about socialism  https://t.co/eZh9rtKE1u
Congratulations @SamaraHeavrin on you nomination in the race for House District 18! You will be a great congresswoman. I hope everyone will support her this November. https://t.co/zdXjMcJkg9

My friend @repthomasmassie stands up for KY and is one of the few people who can be counted on to defend your Liberty.  He does what he said he would do - every day.  He has my full support. https://t.co/UeI9cqxqM0

Every single Republican I know decried President Obama’s use of executive power to legislate. We were right then. But the only way to be an honest officeholder is to stand up for the same principles no matter who is in power. https://t.co/RGxv82Lg97
